title: 820-3115-B low ppbus_g3h
message: resistance pins 17/18 o.000 m ohms  and 27/28 0.00 ohms (u7000) and resistance (r5410)-to ground 0.083 and then drops to 0 m ohms

title: 820-3115-B low ppbus_g3h
message:
something is wrong on your measures, please check again...

Resistance from F7040 to ground
Resistance on pins 17/18 (one tip on pin 17 the other on pin 18)
Resistance on pins 27/28 (one tip on pin 27 the other on pin 28)

title: 820-3115-B low ppbus_g3h
message: pin 17-18 4.0 m ohms 8.98 m ohms pin 27-28 and F7040 pin 1 to ground 0.8 m ohms

title: 820-3115-B low ppbus_g3h
message: and pin 2 to ground (f7040) 30.34 k ohms
